title: Pfister Northcott BRB-MG1C-Towel Ring in Polished Chrome
features: Traditional towel ring with concealed screw installation
Superior mounting posts for secure installation
Part of the Pfister Northcott collection of bathroom accessories, bath faucets, and tub and shower trims
description: Redefine traditional style with Northcott, a Pfister bath collection that brings modern sensibility to classic bathroom design. This collection begins with centerpiece faucets featuring graceful, rounded lines inspired by vintage plumbing fixtures. The easy to clean design is coupled with high quality solid cast construction and thoughtful features like a multifunction showerhead with 5 spray modes and matching bath accessories. To complete your vision, items of this collection include single handle bathroom faucets, 4 inch centerset bathroom faucets, 8 inch widespread bath sink faucets, tub and shower faucets complete with shower diverter, roman tub trims and bathtub faucets, and bath tub spouts as well as a matching bathroom accessories and bath hardware. The assortment of bath accessories includes towel bars, towel rings, robe hooks and towel hooks, and tissue holders. All are available in Polished Chrome, Brushed Nickel, and Tuscan bronze. The faucets in this collection are deck mounted, but if you are looking for wall mount bathroom faucet options, the Pfister Kenzo collection contains an assortment of bathroom sink faucets and bathroom tub faucets in closed spout and waterfall faucet configurations. These wall mount tub faucets create a contemporary presence in any space with their angular forms. Additionally, the Kenzo collection contains matte black faucet options for a modern look. And, if you are looking for a tub faucet with hand shower, you will find this in the expansive Kenzo collection.
